uploads.empty_state:
Looks like you haven't shared any files yet!
No worries, you're just a drag and drop away from sharing. Or, if you prefer, select a file to get started.

link_copied.error: Failed to copy link to the clipboard

delete.warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the file on the server and it cannot be dowloaded later.

error.invalid: The theme should be Dark, Light or System

server.label: Server URL
server.description: Change the target server URL for upload files. It may produce unexpected errors uploading new files. Change at your risk!

error.invalid: The server URL should be string
error.format: The server URL should be a valid URL

upload.exists: A file with the same id already exists on the server.
upload.not_exists: The file does is not previously registered on the server before upload.
upload.max_file_size_exceeded: The file exceeds the maximum allowed size by the server.
upload.not_completed: The upload has not completed yet. It is possible that the file provided is corrupted.
upload.client_error: A client error occurred while uploading.

delete.not_exists: The file you are trying to delete does not exist on the server.
delete.internal_server_error: An internal server error occurred while deleting the file: {{message}}
delete.client_error: A client error occurred while deleting the file.
